h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Stained Jade Gourd Location
content: The Stained Jade Gourd can be found in The Webbed Hollow, within the secret area: Purple Cloud Mountain upon defeating The Scorpionlord. You must kill the boss before defeating [ The Duskveil in this area, as it will lock Purple Cloud Mountain off. To reach this area, you will need to defeat the Venom Doaist") twice within The Webbed Hollow.

The Stained Jade Gourd can be found in The Webbed Hollow, within the secret area: Purple Cloud Mountain upon defeating The Scorpionlord. You must kill the boss before defeating [ The Duskveil in this area, as it will lock Purple Cloud Mountain off. To reach this area, you will need to defeat the Venom Doaist") twice within The Webbed Hollow.
